__e: Well, that's funny because Detective Bell met a witness last night that says that that man paid a visit to your morgue last week.
Bell's got a lotta money riding on this job.
Your mate Dave Bell, he said that you were a good bloke.
The people who were here earlier-- Detective Bell and the others-- they told you that the man who took you seven years ago was a bad man, that he hurt you, abused you.
Somehow Bell managed to cross back and forth although precisely how we can find no record.
I've had no luck reaching you today, so...
That is what Walter Bishop and William Bell did to me.
William Bell told me that the people from over there, the people that tried to kill me, that killed Charlie, they were looking for someone.
I think Bell gave me a message.
